about.summary: Tools to make it easier to work with "tables" of 'grobs'. The 'gtable' package defines a 'gtable' grob class that specifies a grid along with a list of grobs and their placement in the grid. Further the package makes it easy to manipulate and combine 'gtable' objects so that  complex compositions can be build up sequentially.

Tools to make it easier to work with "tables" of 'grobs'. The 'gtable' package defines a 'gtable' grob class that specifies a grid along with a list of grobs and their placement in the grid. Further the package makes it easy to manipulate and combine 'gtable' objects so that  complex compositions can be build up sequentially.

name: r-gtable
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-gtable
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/gtable_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/gtable/gtable_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8bd62c5722d5188914d667cabab12991c555f657f4f5ce7b547571ae3aec7cb5

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('gtable')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('gtable')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/r-lib/gtable
  license: GPL-2
  summary: Tools to make it easier to work with "tables" of 'grobs'. The 'gtable' package defines a 'gtable' grob class that specifies a grid along with a list of grobs and their placement in the grid. Further the package makes it easy to manipulate and combine 'gtable' objects so that  complex compositions can be build
    up sequentially.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: gtable
# Title: Arrange 'Grobs' in Tables
# Version: 0.3.0
# Authors@R:  c(person(given = "Hadley", family = "Wickham", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "hadley@rstudio.com"), person(given = "Thomas Lin", family = "Pedersen", role = "aut", email = "thomas.pedersen@rstudio.com"), person(given = "RStudio", role = "cph"))
# Description: Tools to make it easier to work with "tables" of 'grobs'. The 'gtable' package defines a 'gtable' grob class that specifies a grid along with a list of grobs and their placement in the grid. Further the package makes it easy to manipulate and combine 'gtable' objects so that  complex compositions can be build up sequentially.
